import React from 'react' const Text = ({ as = "h1", children}) => { switch (as){ case "h2": return

{children}

case "h3": return

{children}

case "h4": return

{children}

case "h5": return
{children}
case "h6": return
{children}
case "p": return

{children}

default: return

{children}

} } export default Text
